detail_desc: CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Jacquard-weave trousers in recycled polyester and nylon containing glittery threads. High waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, concealed pockets in the side seams and a fake back pocket. Fitted at the top with straight legs with sewn-in creases and slits at the hems.
Loafers in textured imitation leather with fringes at the front. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Long jumper in a soft knit in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trousers in a sturdy, slightly stretchy cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back pockets with a press-stud. Fake fly, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and raw edges.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs. Length 52 cm, 62 cm and 66 cm.
Non-wired bras in jersey with a wide, elasticated hem, adjustable shoulder straps and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and button placket.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide ribbed waistband containing a concealed key pocket, and legs with ventilating hole-patterned sections and ribbed hems.
Knee-high boots in soft imitation suede with an elastic gore at the back and zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front, narrow ribbing around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Short, V-neck dress in soft denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and short sleeves. Chest pockets with a pleat, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fabric-covered plastic Alice band with a bow on top.
A pair of hoop earrings in plastic and metal.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with pleats, buttons down the front and high slits. Unlined.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Vest top in airy jersey with a print motif on the front and rounded hem.
Suede sandals wide wrapover straps that tie around the ankles. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 9 cm.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves, decorative buttons down the front and a smocked hem.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back, elasticated ribbing at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening and ties at the top, and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.

Long-sleeved body in lace and microfibre with a half-string back. Deep V-neck at the front, an open section at the back with an adjustable strap at the back of the waist, and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short, two-strand metal chain necklace decorated with shells and a round pendant with a punched motif. Adjustable length 40-47 cm.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Fitted, off-the shoulder top in a fine rib knit with a wide lace trim at the top and long sleeves.
Shirt in soft washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and raw-edge hems.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Lace push-up bralette with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable, lace-covered shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Pre-tied bow tie in a spotted dobby weave with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.
Wide polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with short sleeves, smocking and frill details.
Top in a fine-knit viscose blend with a supersoft, brushed finish. Round neck, low dropped shoulders, and decorative bead appliqués down the sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck opening at the front, short, butterfly sleeves and a gathered yoke at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Satin lining.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ankle-length legs with creases.

prod_name: Joe s/l pj in rib BB
detail_desc: Pyjamas with a T shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with short raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Non-wired, push-up lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable, partially lace-covered shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Round-necked T-shirts in premium cotton jersey.

Practical travel jewellery case in grained imitation leather that folds up and fastens with a strap.Two zipped inner compartments. Two straps: one with a press-stud at one end designed to hold rings and one with eight holes designed to hold earrings. Soft velour lining. Size 21x27.5 cm.
Short dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Sleeveless playsuit in printed cotton jersey with a narrow, elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and small frill trim at the hems.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Shorts in soft twill made from Tencel™ lyocell with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Fake fly and decorative button at the waist.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties. Lined.
Twill cap with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Striped, long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, a small chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in soft jersey with an opening with a tie at the front and gathered shoulders. Seam at the waist with decorative lacing at the sides and straight-cut skirt with a rounded hem.
Small, round shoulder bag in paper straw with appliqués and embroidery on the front. Narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end, and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Lined. Size 5x16 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly and buttons, side pockets, and straight, wide legs.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Fisherman's hat in cotton with an embroidered appliqué. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.

Padded parka with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined, detachable hood with a faux fur trim and reflective strip. Off-centre zipped pocket at the top, patch front pockets with a flap, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
GP & J BAKER x H&M. Hairband in an airy, patterned weave with a knot detail at the front, satin lining and covered elastic at the back.
V-neck top in airy, patterned jersey with an elasticated seam under the bust, gathered shoulders and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an embroidered text motif on the front.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trainers in brogue-patterned imitation leather with lacing at the front, a padded tongue and heel, and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with concealed press-studs at the back. Seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in crinkled jersey with long sleeves and a gently draped, wrapover back.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dresses in printed jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Dungarees in soft organic cotton jersey with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and fasten with a press-stud at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and ribbed hems.
